column1: # Data from: smith et al (2010) Science 328:1700 doi:10.1126/science.1189675
#   GVB206.3 = Experimentally-evolved Myxococcus xanthus strain, resistant to rifampicin
#   GJV10 = Wild-type Myxococcus xanthus strain, resistant to kanamycin
#   initial_cells_X = Initial number of strain X cells (colony-forming units per plate)
#   exptl_block = Experimental replicate (start date in lab notebook)
#   colony_count_Rif = colony count on plates containing rifampicin
#   colony_count_Km = colony count on plates containing kanamycin
#   X_2 = second experimental measurement of X (another plate)
#   final_spores_X = final number of strain X spores = colony_count * dilution (colony-forming units per plate)
#   Data are geometric mean of repeated measurements from same sample
